title: Bushed
creator_credit: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Steve French
brief_description: An animated story about a displaced Aboriginal who meets a misplaced kangaroo. Together they “travel the bush of Australia like true-born native men”. But the bush has changed and they discover that “you can’t go home again”.
creator_credit_for_label: Swinburne Institute of Technology. Film and Television School and Steve French
